NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 OENO: Yes, yes... You're so close..! 2 1 OENO: No! It scampered off again... 3 2 OENO: You saw the vision orb move up slightly, didn't you, Coleus? Neither of us were looking directly at the orb, were we? 4 3 OENO: I have been adjusting our vision orbs to accomodate the native lifeforms' vision to allow them to use them, you see. I am quite hopeful they'll learn to use it soon! 5 4 COLEUS: I wish I could credit their eyes, Oeno - but I'm afraid it is more likely that may have been the Attlerock's gravity tugging the vision orb upwards as it orbited overhead! 6 5 OENO: Was the Attlerock orbiting overhead just now? Curses.. I can't seem to get them to look at the vision orb long enough without becoming distracted! 7 6 CYCAD: Were you playing with the native lifeforms again, Oeno? You sure love teaching them more about our culture and technology! 8 7 OENO: Of course! It's lovely seeing these lifeforms learn and grow more curious, now that they've grown much more comfortable with our presence. 9 8 CYCAD: Oh, before I forget! Oeno: Yarrow was looking for you! There appears to be some issue regarding the warp towers on Ash Twin which he wanted you to look into. 10 9 OENO: How vague.. Did he mention what sort of problem it was? 11 10 CYCAD: Apparently, the Sun Station crew reported to Yarrow that they noticed their warp tower's rotating doors opening and closing by themselves, without any sort of input. 12 11 CYCAD: When Yarrow went to check on the issue, he noticed the same thing happening to the rotating doors at Timber Hearth's warp tower as well! 13 12 OENO: How strange.. My thanks for delivering this message, Cycad. I shall travel to Ash Twin to catch up with Yarrow and investigate this issue as soon as I can! Nomai Mine Entry 2 8
